quests.name: Pilgrimage
quests.description: Complete the Pilgrimage of the Nine Divines to show that you are worthy.

quests.name: The Shrine of the Crusader
quests.description: Retrieve the Helm of the Crusader from Pelinal's lost shrine.

quests.name: Priory of the Nine
quests.description: Retrieve the Cuirass of the Crusader from the Priory of the Nine.

quests.name: Stendarr's Mercy
quests.description: Retrieve the Gauntlets of the Crusader from the Chapel of Stendarr in Chorrol.

quests.name: The Path of the Righteous
quests.description: Retrieve the Mace of Zenithar from the Chapel of Zenithar in Leyawiin.

quests.name: Wisdom of the Ages
quests.description: Retrieve the Shield of the Crusader from Fort Bulwark.

quests.name: Nature's Fury
quests.description: Retrieve the Boots of the Crusader from the Shrine of Kynareth.

quests.name: The Faithful Squire
quests.description: Retrieve the Greaves of the Crusader from Lathon.

quests.name: The Sword of the Crusader
quests.description: Retrieve the Sword of the Crusader and reconsecrate it.

quests.name: The Blessing of Talos
quests.description: Obtain the ninth relic: The Blessing of Talos.

quests.name: Umaril the Unfeathered
quests.description: Defeat Umaril and kill him for good, in both the physical and spiritual planes.
